title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.16 - Certificates of completion and student lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.16 - Certificates of completion and student lists

State Regulations
(a) After
successful completion of a course of study, each approved entity shall provide
a certification of completion as prescribed by the Department of State. Each
certificate shall be signed by an authorized representative of the approved
entity and shall have affixed thereto the official seal of the approved
entity. (b) An approved entity
shall provide upon request to the department a list of the names and addresses
of students who have successfully completed each course of instruction. Each
such list shall be certified by the provider as true and accurate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
163.16

Adopted

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
